reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Tanzania - Government Debt Issuance and Management

description.narrative: Support the establishment of a sound private, well-functioning, equitable financial sector that fulfills critical roles in a market economy, most importantly financial intermediation – the efficient generation and allocation of savings to their most productive use.

This award strives to support the establishment of a sound private, well-functioning, equitable financial sector that fulfills critical roles in a market economy. More specifically, this includes Assist the central bank and MoF to broaden, deepen, and otherwise improve the domestic capital markets with particular emphasis on government securities. Revise rules and requirements for primary dealers to facilitate more efficient auctions and a liquid secondary market. Revise the issuance calendar for medium term securities utilizing tap issues. Review existing cash management activities to reduce unnecessary borrowing. Formulate a post-MDRI debt strategy. Support the Bank of Tanzania and the MoF in developing an IT platform capable of providing real-time cash balance information from a Treasury Single Account. Help country to obtain an initial sovereign debt rating; develop the process for issuing sovereign debt; and build the capacity to monitor future sovereign bond issues including debt service, application of proceeds, and investor relations..

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Strong partners for over five decades, Tanzania and the United States are working towards a shared vision of improving the quality of life for all Tanzanians. Despite its political stability and high levels of economic growth over the past two decades, roughly 28 percent of the population lives below the poverty line. The goal of U.S. assistance is to promote a healthy, prosperous, democratic, well-governed and secure Tanzania.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: International Affairs Technical Assistance, Executive Office of the President
International Affairs Technical Assistance, Executive Office of the President
